doc:
Roger Blin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roger_Blin 0 Roger Blin (Neuilly-sur-Seine, France, 22 March 1907 – Évecquemont, France, 21 January 1984) was a French actor and director notable for staging world premieres of Samuel Beckett's Waiting for Godot in 1953 and Endgame (play) in 1957. Roger_Blin ( Neuilly-sur-Seine_,_France , 22_March_1907 – Évecquemont , France , 21_January_1984 ) was a_French_actor_and_director_notable for staging world_premieres of Samuel_Beckett 's_Waiting for Godot in 1953 and Endgame ( play ) in 1957 .
